thread.title: Great Hotel! Awesome Location! Great Staff! LARGE ROOMS!!!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel! Awesome Location! Great Staff! LARGE ROOMS!!! - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: paulincerto
title: Great Hotel! Awesome Location! Great Staff! LARGE ROOMS!!!
text: I have stayed here several times. I also had the pleasure of being checked in by Andrew at the front desk. He is always courteous and outgoing and makes sure I am satisfied with my room. The rooms are large, especially for New York City. Its located directly across the street from the famous Madison Square Garden and the rooms are clean.
